Updates.Start: lambda start: 1 if (-1)*start>0  else(start if (-1)*start==0 else 0)
Updates.SK: lambda start,sk: 1 if (1*start+(-1)*sk)>0 else(sk if (1*start+(-1)*sk)>0==0 else 0)
Updates.Ste9: lambda ste9,sk,cdc2,cdc2_, pp: 1 if ((-1)*sk+(-1)*cdc2+(-1)*cdc2_+1*pp) >0 else (ste9 if((-1)*sk+(-1)*cdc2+(-1)*cdc2_+1*pp)==0 else 0)
Updates.Rum1: lambda rum1, sk, cdc2, pp, cdc2_: 1 if ((-1)*sk+ (-1)*cdc2+1*pp+(-1)*cdc2_)>0 else (rum1 if ((-1)*sk+ (-1)*cdc2+1*pp+(-1)*cdc2_) ==0 else 0)
Updates.PP: lambda pp, slp1: 1 if ((-1)*pp+1*slp1)>0 else (pp if ((-1)*pp+1*slp1)==0 else 0 )
Updates.Cdc25: lambda cdc25, cdc2,  pp: 1 if (1*cdc2+ (-1)*pp)>0 else (cdc25 if (1*cdc2+ (-1)*pp)==0 else 0)
Updates.Slp1: lambda slp1, cdc2_: 1 if ((-1)*slp1 + 1*cdc2_) > 0 else (slp1 if ((-1)*slp1 +cdc2_)==0 else 0)
Updates.Wee1/Mik1: lambda wee, cdc2, pp: 1 if ((-1)*cdc2 + 1*pp)>0 else (wee if ((-1)*cdc2 + 1*pp)==0 else 0)
Updates.Cdc2/Cdc13*: lambda cdc2_, wee, rum1, ste9, slp1, cdc25: 1 if ((-1)*wee+(-1)*rum1+(-1)*ste9+(-1)*slp1+1*cdc25)>=1 else 0
